title: Mecha Malphite Chroma Bug [Gameplay]
body: Mecha Malphite's chroma skin has an in game bug in which his w animation doesn't go through, not giving you lava hot spike hands. Please fix this, I just bought it. (I have the black chroma skin.) Thank you!

replies.body: Thanks for the report! You should see this fixed up with the next patch that's headed out shortly. ^-^
Patch 6.22.... Still broken, why is too hard fix that? I wasted my money...

Hey - 

Quick update - This issue is requiring more than just an animation fix, which is why it's taking longer than a patch.We thought we had a solve for this, but it's not the solve we need for the entire issue. The TL;DR is that we're enlisting the help of engineers to help us because this isn't simply a change in the animation, but something a bit more complex.

I've gone ahead and pinged the issue again to get a bit more traction on it. Thanks for your patience!
